quote: Her one drink had Cecelia giggling and talking and she was explaining that animals had souls too. Nobody challenged her opinion. It was possible, we knew. What we weren't sure of was if we had any.
quote_letters: HER ONE DRINK HAD CECELIA GIGGLING AND TALKING AND SHE WAS EXPLAINING THAT ANIMALS HAD SOULS TOO NOBODY CHALLENGED HER OPINION IT WAS POSSIBLE WE KNEW WHAT WE WERENT SURE OF WAS IF WE HAD ANY
